summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5598 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 3, Pleasant Ridge Addition, being the alley between 1st Avenue West and Queen Anne, from West Newell Street to West Armour Street; and certain other alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 73677 as amended by Ordinance No. 73791, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
